channel.title: GitHub Trending - Rust (Daily)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in Rust nel periodo daily

item.title: 🦀 Tommyboulianne/ChatConnect-Realtime (18 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: Tommyboulianne

📝 Repository: Tommyboulianne/ChatConnect-Realtime

📄 Descrizione: 🔗 Real-time Communication Engine: Core networking engine for low-latency message delivery using WebSockets. 💬 Separated for modular backend services. 📡 🌐

💻 Linguaggio: Rust

📜 Licenza: No license
